## Origin {#origin}

## Insertion {#insertion}
8-12th ribs (inferior borders near angles) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Innervation {#innervation}
[Spinal nn.]({{< var ref-spinal-nerves.path >}}) T9-T12 (Anterior rami) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020

## Action {#action}

Depresses ribs
